This method perform the logic for the number of items that can buy with the amount given

Parameters

  • items – The list of items with its cost

  • amount – The limit of mount

Returns

The sum of the prices for each item that we can buy items: All the items for buy

class cupon.views.CuponView(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelViewSet

This is the view for API cupon, it have two methods create and stats The method create is a overrided method The method stats is a new method using the decorator action

Parameters

Returns

Response
